name: Crispin
description: Making sure everything we do is brilliant and always getting better. 20 years as a developer, now full time advocate for apprenticeships and equality.

name: Naomi
description: Looking after all our learners and partners, keeping projects running smoothly. Working in apprenticeships since 2006, also heads up our social media channels - it’s Naomi you’re talking to on twitter and instagram.

name: Helen
occupation: Head of Partnerships and Social Mission
description: Keeping us on track with compliance and constantly improving the quality of our delivery. She’s also heading up our social mission.

name: Fiona
description: First point of contact for our partners and customers, making sure everyone we work with shares our vision and gets the most out of apprenticeships and training.

name: Alex
description: Devising, delivering monitoring and improving our technical training. Alex is a very experienced web developer and qualified trainer and assessor too.

name: Mark
description: Heads up progress reviews and on-course monitoring. Mark has been working in apprenticeships for xx years, our resident expert in all things ‘Apprenticeship Standards’ - delivery, quality, achievement and compliance.
